title: Emo
description: Emo is an emoji status update from your friends. When they update their emo, you get notified.

title: Atoms
description: Test project to learn iOS8 new APIs.  This project uses Widgets, Swift, and UIEffectView to give the user a beautiful single page weather report.

title: Orb
description: This game was created to test the three major app stores. I created an game that was distributed to all three stores with the goal of testing the effectiveness each store.

title: Full Screen Gestures
description: While working on an iOS app, our team became frustrated at the speed and efficiency of native mobile widget interactions. The new mobile/touch platform is still using widgets and interactions from the old desktop/mouse platform. Realizing an opportunity for new paradigms, we challenged ourselves to reimagine widgets using the full screen. The original ideas flowed from a full screen color picker which is the first widget we implemented. The color picker was the first step in creating the Conopsys (COS) widget set.

title: Flappy Block
description: This is an iOS version of the smash hit Flappy Bird built using iOS7's physics engine. Since Dong Nguyen took the game down, I wanted to see how hard it would actually be to create the game. This is the No Mercy Edition so when you lose you have to quit the game which adds an extra level of annoyance. to an already annoying game. This was made only as an exercise for using the physics engine. Good luck and have fun.

title: Touch Visualizer
description: Visualize Touches in your iOS applications

title: Conopsys
description: Conopsys is a mobile platform automating connected devices.  Our mobile application, Otto, bridges hardware and software allowing users to quickly create events based on contextual filters such as time, location, and proximity

title: R8Ì…R
description: An iOS application created for a Parse + Facebook hackathon.  The application lets you quickly rate things on a scale of 0-5 as well as letting you add a category and an adjective

title: XO9
description: iOS game I created using the rules from a blog post of a game called Ultimate Tic-Tac-Toe.  I designed the application, produced the music, created the graphics, developed the universal binary iOS application, created the website, and created the marketing material

title: joeblau.com
description: My main landing page for all of my work.  The site uses a creative string which contains every digital means of reach me including phone number, email and all of my social networks.

title: gitignore.io
description: Gitignore.io is a website to generate useful .gitignore files for your project.  The site uses a a function command to allow you run git ignore from your command line via gi command

title: jjbshort
description: Bit.ly style URL shortner that was a coding challenge for a job interview at GetAround. Google App Engine based code with test cases and a UI

title: Proxignos
description: Sensor proximity authentication API. This concept is an API designed to compare multiple sensors on a mobile devices at a specific time segment to determine whether or not two devices are near each other.

title: Juke
description: Group Spotify powered jukebox. This design concept allows multiple users to create a group playlist using Spotify's API. The Jukebox host uses their their device to play the music while  other users can add songs and then vote them up or down.

title: MedRec
description: Medical record design challenge

title: Stop SOPA
description: The Stop Online Piracy Act web browser plugin alerts you to which sites support SOPA.  This plugin runs in the background and proivdes a large alert to let you know if the website that you're using is a SOPA supporter.

title: TwitSkills
description: Twitter based job search engine concept that uses hashtags to create job titles.  #$ would be a custom hashtag for adding a skill to your profile.  Users can then search for skills based on indexed Twit Skills.

title: Metmo
description: Contest to design a Washington D.C. Metro transit mobile web application.  The application tied into WMTA's API to provide real-time alerts and train schedules.

title: Male/Female Translator
description: Male/Female translation site which I created as a joke site while Text From Last Night was popular.

title: Vroomtrap
description: Online Real-Time Speed Trap Database which real-time geo-tagging to add and alert users when speed traps are near.  The application was built cross platform to run on iOS, Android, Blackberry and Windows Mobile 6.

title: InstallRoot
description: Original designer of Install Root; The DoD Intermediate and Root certificates installer.  This Java application installs Intermediate and Root certificates into your store in and in-band fashion.  This application is run on millions of machines.
